learning_path.description: Essential programming skills required for ML and AI
Data gathering, cleaning, and preparation for ML
Neural networks and deep learning architectures
NLP techniques and models for text processing
Large Language Models and their mechanisms
Frameworks and libraries for building agents
Combining agentic systems with RAG for advanced applications
Managing costs and optimizing model usage
Adapting pre-trained models for specific tasks
Building real-world projects to consolidate learning
